simulationmodel

Interface IEvent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Arrival, ArrivalEqualDist, ArrivalShortest, Departure, Event

    public interface IEvent

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void eventExec(BasicSimulator simulator)
      events should have a certain effect on the simulation.
      double getExecTime()
      events should have a point in time when they take place.

    • Method Detail

      • eventExec

        void eventExec(BasicSimulator simulator)
        events should have a certain effect on the simulation. this function executes the event so that its effects become effective.
        Parameters:
        simulator - the simulator the event should affect.

      • getExecTime

        double getExecTime()
        events should have a point in time when they take place. this is the getter for it.
        Returns:
        the events timestamp.
